entries.cant_work: You seem to stay quite busy. I like that. When you have the time to take on some more work, I think we could do business together.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Get away from me if you value your own skin. I have no use for outsiders.
entries.dontknowyou_2: This isn't the place for you. I'm waiting for another.
entries.dontknowyou_3: You are not the one I seek. Remove yourself from my presence and you may yet live.
entries.gotowork_2: What have you done with the lightsaber? If that swindler is up to something he'll spend more years dying than he has yet lived.
entries.next: I think it would be for the best if we severed our association for a short time. I'm still trying to make a deal to get offworld and we wouldn't want people to get the wrong idea about us.
entries.notit_1: The lightsaber would be that handle shaped thing with a stud on it. Have another look why don't you.
entries.npc_1_1: I think you and I are going to be great friends. We share a certain flair for business and a way with people, don't you think? Between my brains and your capacity for mayhem, I think we'll go far. You do have a capacity for mayhem I hope. You're certainly on the wrong world if you don't. You could show me those skills by recovering an item of mine that was wrongfully taken from me. I'll even pay you. What do you say?
entries.npc_1_2: My dear friend! Back to see me in this, my darkest hour? I knew you'd never believe those foul rumors people were spreading about me. It's times like this that teach you who your friends are. I only wish I had someone to help me clear up this mess. Wait -- here's a thought. People haven't found a reason to distrust you yet. Can you help me?
entries.npc_1_3: You've got to help me. The Nightsisters realized I sold them a phony copy of their lightsaber and now they've sent one of their worst after me to kill me. Why doesn't anybody ever have a sense of humor about these matters? Please, tell me you'll help me!
entries.npc_2_1: All you need to do is find the Nightsister Gruthashaal and convince her to give up my lightsaber. I hope she hasn't figured out how to get the blamed thing running. The Nightsisters are notoriously uncooperative so be prepared for the worst.
entries.npc_2_2: I knew I could count on you. Just deliver this lightsaber to the Nightsister Trujhazii. It will bring peace between us. The other Nightsisters are a little upset about the whole affair - don't let any of them give you any trouble.
entries.npc_2_3: I knew you wouldn't let them take me. We mean too much to one another to let a little thing like fraud come between us. Go and find this murderous Nightsister and convince her of my goodwill -- or barring that, put a stop to her.
entries.npc_3_1: I understand your reticence. I'm not keen to get into a fight with a lightsaber-wielding Nightsister. What if she got the blasted thing working?
entries.npc_3_2: I can't believe you'd leave an old friend in the lurch like this. After all we've been through together.
entries.npc_3_3: My blood is on your hands. You could have saved me and didn't.
entries.npc_4_1: An ancient lightsaber that I purchased as a collector's item. It doesn't actually work but is nonetheless quite valuable. One of those blasted Nightsisters took it from my old partner because of some imagined slight or other. Will get it back for me?
entries.npc_4_2: Nothing you need concern yourself with. You have my complete assurance that all the charges are largely without any basis in fact and even if they were, there's certainly not enough evidence for a conviction.
entries.npc_4_3: I expected to be off of this blasted world before they found out. Things didn't work out like I planned or I'd be drunk in a villa on Naboo right now. Terrible things happen to people who fall afoul of those Nightsisters. Help me?
entries.npc_5_2: A simple thing really. I found a buyer for that lightsaber and if you can make the delivery for me I'll have enough credits to make my problems disappear. What do you say?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: You've got something on your mind. Spit it out.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: You haven't changed your mind have you? I'd hate to think I offended you in some way.
entries.npc_breech_1: That imbecile needs to learn that I'm not going to let any of his little minions steal this priceless historical artifact.
entries.npc_breech_2: That scoundrel better deliver this time.
entries.npc_breech_3: You will not stand between us and our revenge.
entries.npc_failure_1: What will I tell my buyer? Perhaps I can sell the idea that this Nightsister is my courier. Then when she kills him the matter will resolve itself and I can find another buyer.
entries.npc_failure_2: Blast and double blast! Some days it just isn't profitable swindling people.
entries.npc_failure_3: You couldn't stop her? I've got to find a place to hide.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Some of the other Nightsisters of her clan may still be peeved about that imagined slight.  It might be best if we waited before attempting to conclude this business. Come see me later.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Give me a few minutes to make some final arrangements and then we'll get started, all right?
entries.npc_noloc_3: Wait! Maybe you should just wait here and protect me. That's not a bad idea is it? Or maybe you should go. I can't decide.
entries.npc_reset: Don't think you're up to this right now, eh? Come back when you think you're ready.
entries.npc_reward_1: Steal? The nerve of her. I offered a very fair price for this. It's hardly my fault she turned it down.
entries.npc_reward_2: I never doubted you for a moment. I knew that if anybody could pull this off it was you.
entries.npc_reward_3: Thank you. I need to find a way off of this blasted rock before they send another one of those bloodthirsty monsters after me.
entries.npc_smuggle_1: Go back and be done with me!
entries.npc_smuggle_2: I told my sisters that rather than paying the ransom we should just rip his head off and take the lightsaber off his corpse, but they wouldn't listen.
entries.npc_work_1: Get a move on now. There's no time like the present for getting things done.
entries.npc_work_2: Have you made that little delivery we discussed. Waiting isn't going to help this matter any.
entries.npc_work_3: You're going to leave soon and stop her from killing me aren't you?
entries.player_3_3: What did you expect to happen?
entries.player_4_2: What do you want me to do this time?
entries.player_reset: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return to Singular Nak with the broken lightsaber.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Return to Singular Nak at the Trade Outpost.
entries.return_waypoint_description_3: Return to Singular Nak and inform him of your success.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Find Grthashaal and take the broken lightsaber from her
entries.waypoint_description_3: Go and stop the Nightsister before she kills Singular Nak
entries.npc_reset_1: Don't think you're up to this right now, eh? Come back when you think you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_2: Don't think you're up to this right now, eh? Come back when you think you're ready.
entries.npc_reset_3: Don't think you're up to this right now, eh? Come back when you think you're ready.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
